game.name: Hope Company
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 인류의 보루가 되어, 공격자들의 물결에 맞서 싸우고, 영웅이 절실히 필요한 세상에서 용병 부대를 지휘하세요. 칼, 화살, 총알, 폭탄으로 승리로 향하는 길을 개척하세요. 하지만 성공을 위해 무엇을 할 의향이 있나요? 괴물과 싸우기 위해, 승리를 위해 얼마나 많은 인간성을 희생할 의향이 있나요?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Be the bulwark of humanity, fight waves of attackers and command your mercenary company through a world in dire need of heroes. By swords, arrows, bullets or bombs carve a path to victory. But what are you willing to do to succeed? To fight monsters, how much humanity will you sacrifice for victory?
